ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know, but I hjave heard that you can kill the gnoms at the two other obsearvatories and they will have the lens on them. Who was it that said an
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know, but I hjave heard that you can kill the gnoms at the two other
obsearvatories and they will have the lens on them.
Who was it that said an assistant guide told him that tinkering was fully
functional? Well that may be true, maybe it is fully fuctional now. But that
doesn't mean that the related quests are ;)
Another thing, for all we know, this may have nothing to do with tinkering.
Maybe when we finish the quest we'll get a piece of cloth armor and a few
sliver. I'm not saying we should give up, because it's the best lead we have
for now, but I'm just saying, don't get your hopes to high, even if we can
find all he lenses.

>Ok, if anyone has received a SPARE TELESCOPE LENS, please let me know.
>
>So far, I have been able to get only the one off the dark elf in Freeport.
>
>The one that Bidl Frugrin has, well, as we all know, I haven't found.
>
>The other two from the observatories, well, they keep telling me to come
>back in a few weeks. Has anyone gotten one from them? Please let me know
>how.
>
>Madix Grizzlestrike (aka Madgrizzle)
>Bristlebane Server
